EmailTemplate.name: RCA reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See your Social Action Projects come to Life!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
[youtube https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0Zj1JEGepxs]

As a member of The Challenge Society, you have access to a range of inspiring events and exciting opportunities which give you the chance to get involved in activities that will help you to develop key skills, make adifference and reunite with your friends.>
